episode_event_salon_pasiosalon_date_ch00:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] met up with
Hilda for a Pokémon battle.
Oh, there you are!
Let’s get this battle started!

Hm... Hang on a sec. Are you hiding
something from me?
Your smile seems a bit forced today...
Are you not feeling well?
I knew it! You should’ve said something!
I see. You’re in a battling slump, huh.

Hm? It’s surprising how quickly I noticed
something was off?
I mean...

You can’t have a good tag battle if you
can’t tell how your partner’s doing!

I guess all that time I spent at the
Battle Subway battling with makeshift
partners is coming in handy!

I suppose I also have you to thank,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].

You’re always keeping an eye on everyone
and making sure we’re OK.
(Apologize for making her worry.)

Oh, don’t apologize! We all have our
off days!
(Thank her for understanding.)
It feels a little weird when you’re so polite!
If you don’t feel up to battling today...
maybe you should take a break!

I know! Next time we hang out, let’s do
something different!

And this isn’t just to get you over your
slump, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
It’ll be fun to spend time together!
Days later...

[Name:PlayerNickname ] and Hilda went
for a walk on a sweets-tasting tour.
Casteliacones sound good...but so do crepes.
Ooooh, I can’t decide!
Hm? We could get both and compare?
Yeah! Let’s do that!

I’m so glad we ordered both! They were so
yummy!
Thanks, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
How’d you know that’d make me happy?

The tables have turned, huh. This time,
you noticed something about me!

I know it’s important to speak up when you
have something important to say...

But words aren’t the only way to express
our feelings.

Sometimes, thinking of what makes others
happy can help you notice what they’re
truly feeling.

It’s the same as with Trainers and Pokémon,
isn’t it!
That said...

You shouldn’t over-accommodate, either.
Otherwise you’ll lose momentum.

Sometimes it’s important to listen to your
heart and follow it to its fullest!
Does that give you some ideas?

Awesome! I’m glad my advice was helpful.
I can tell from the look on your face!

It was fun chatting with you and doing
something other than battling for a change!
I’ve got loads of other things I wanna do...
So the rest of my day is packed!
Do you know what I wanna do next?
You got it! Of course—a Pokémon battle!

Now that you’re feeling better, let’s get out
there and give it our all!
